education: Master's Degree (M1) in MIAGE (Informatics and Management), Licence in Law, Economics, and Management, MPSI Preparatory Classes, Mathematical Science Baccalaureate
technical_skills: C, PowerShell, SharePoint, JavaScript ES6, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, LESS, XAML, XML, SPFX, MySQL, SQL Server, Power Automate, Nintex, Microsoft Power Platform, Windows Server 2019 Administration, Office 365 Administration, ShareGate, Metalogix, MDM, Micro: Bit, Arduino, WordPress
soft_skills: Team Leadership, Project Management, Communication, Training & Teaching, Consulting
score_description: Le candidat possède une solide expérience en gestion de projets SharePoint, en développement PowerShell et en automatisation des processus. Ses compétences techniques et son expérience correspondent bien aux exigences du poste de Data Analyst Sénior, mais il pourrait renforcer son profil avec des certifications et une expérience plus spécifique en analyse de données avancée.
summary: IT professional with expertise in PowerShell scripting, SharePoint development, and automation. Experienced in managing SharePoint environments, designing custom workflows, and optimizing business processes. Strong technical skills in various programming languages and database management.
